title: Mode FM under Band CB not selectable
body:
Hello,

I got another issue.

Under Band CB I'm not able to select Mode FM on my device.

I'd installed V1.09 with rotated display.
author: BrightCGN

comments.body:
That is correct. The SI4732 is not capable of FM in the CB band.

Regards, Steffen

> That is correct. The SI4732 is not capable of FM in the CB band.
> 
> Regards, Steffen

Thanks for the infos :-)

satisfaction_conditions: A clear explanation of whether the feature is possible or not
Technical reasoning for why a feature limitation exists
